products.title: RED BRICK
products.description: A wonderful coffee to work with, its almond and caramel notes are perfectly balanced by the bright, fruity yum of Los Ancestros.

products.title: TODOS SANTOS
products.description: Sweet, syrupy and delicious with notes of chocolate-covered cherry and blueberry.

products.title: RED DE MUJERES
products.description: Red apple flows into delightful milk chocolate and orange notes that goes dreamily with, or without milk.

products.title: ORTIZ 1900
products.description: Best enjoyed all day every day, expect a creamy pecan texture sprinkled with bits of red grape and fig.

products.title: ARICHA
products.description: Fresh, juicy and oh so delightful Aricha is an Ethiopian must-taste.

products.title: CABALLEROS
products.description: Delightfully balanced, apple and macadamia notes are highlighted by a honeysuckle sweetness.

products.title: DECAF ESPRESSO
products.description: Delightful all the way through, peach swims in caramel and custard.

products.title: LA BOLSA
products.description: Ranking high on our must-try list is La Bolsa from Guatemala.
